section.title: Introduction:
section.paragraph: This directory is intended to hold any documentation that relates to how to run or operate Cinder. Previously, this content was in the admin-guide section of openstack-manuals.
The full spec for organization of documentation may be seen in the OS Manuals Migration Spec <https://specs.openstack.org/openstack/docs-specs/specs/pike/os-manuals-migration.html>.
